location.note: Located at The Spot parking area

hero.subtitle:
Golden fried shrimp, crispy catfish & Southern sides
served fresh from our kitchen to your table

about.teaserParagraph: Captain B started B&R Seafood and More with a simple mission: bring the best golden fried seafood and authentic Southern sides to the community. Every recipe is crafted with love and seasoned with tradition.
storyParagraphs: Captain B started B&R Seafood and More with a simple mission: bring the best golden fried seafood and authentic Southern sides to the community. What began as a love of cooking for family and friends has grown into something the whole community can enjoy.

Every recipe at B&R Seafood is crafted with love and seasoned with tradition. We take pride in using quality ingredients and time-tested techniques to deliver flavors that remind you of home cooking at its finest.

cards.title: Family Tradition
cards.description: Our recipes have been passed down through generations, blending Southern cooking traditions with our own family's unique flavors. Every dish we serve carries a piece of our heritage.

cards.title: Cooked Fresh Daily
cards.description: We believe great food starts with quality ingredients and careful preparation. Our shrimp and catfish are golden fried to perfection, and our sides are made from scratch every single day.
cards.teaserDescription: Made from scratch every single day

cards.title: Serving Our Community
cards.description: From local events to your front door, we're proud to serve our neighbors. Whether you're grabbing a quick bite or feeding the whole family, B&R Seafood and More has you covered.
